## Music
</center>

<left>
Music has always been part of my life. I’m mainly drawn to jazz, classical, rock, and *rock en español*. I studied classical double bass and even performed in an orchestra. Over the years, I’ve learned to play several instruments, including **flute**, recorder, guitar, **bass**, and **double bass**.
